meaningMnemonic: Keep information <kanji>inside</kanji> a <kanji>cord</kanji> that cordons off just you and a few others (or maybe no one else). Only the people you let inside the cord can know, because it's a <vocabulary>secret</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>confidential</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
